Overflow Layouts

These layouts demonstrate the overflow attribute with column layouts.
The overflow="preview" shows a partial preview of the next item.

Columns 1

1-column layout (default) <lay-out md="columns(1)" overflow="preview">

Columns 2

2-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out md="columns(2)" lg="columns(2)" overflow="preview">

Columns 3

3-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out md="grid(3a)" lg="columns(3)" overflow="preview">

Columns 4

4-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out md="columns(2)" lg="columns(4)" overflow="preview">

Columns 5

5-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out md="grid(5a)" lg="columns(5)" overflow="preview">

Columns 6

6-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out md="columns(3)" lg="columns(6)" overflow="preview">
